author: National Geographic
description:
Paid content for @TurkishAirlines. Step inside "Inner Portrait," a groundbreaking immersive art experience by Refik Anadol, that harnesses AI and architectural design to translate the rich data of human travel—its journeys, emotions, and connections—into breathtaking, dynamic visual narratives. Explore a dimension where technology reveals the profound beauty hidden within our shared experiences of exploration.
